author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1993 - Add command to dump Lucene index in Oak Console
Refactor info command to determine index size first and then open index. This enables determining size of corrupted indexes also
Also fixed issue with RefreshCommand by renaming do_refresh to do_now as 'now' is the command option registered

author: navis
msg: HIVE-6601 : alter database commands should support schema synonym keyword (Navis reviewed by Thejas M Nair)

author: daijy
msg: PIG-4057:  All followed by CROSS with default parallelism produces wrong results (PIG-4057-8.patch)
